Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Hotel Riu Palace Tres Islas in La Oliva (Corralejo), you'll be minutes from Corralejo Dunes Natural Park and close to Corralejo Beach. This 4-star hotel is within the region of Playa Las Agujas and Papagayo Beach.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 372 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and flat-screen televisions. Satellite television is provided for your entertainment. Private bathrooms have bidets and hair dryers. Cribs/infant beds (surcharge) and rollaway/extra beds are available on request.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Pamper yourself with a visit to the spa, which offers massages, body treatments, and facials. You're sure to appreciate the recreational amenities, which include 2 outdoor swimming pools, outdoor tennis courts, and a sauna. Additional amenities include wireless Internet access (surcharge), an arcade/game room, and a hair salon.

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at one of the hotel's 3 restaurants. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is noon
Satisfy your appetite at one of the hotel's 3 restaurants. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.

With a stay at Hotel Riu Palace Tres Islas in La Oliva (Corralejo), you'll be minutes from Corralejo Dunes Natural Park and close to Corralejo Beach. This 4-star hotel is within the region of Playa Las Agujas and Papagayo Beach.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Corralejo Dunes Natural Park - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Corralejo Beach - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Playa Las Agujas - 2 km / 1.3 mi
Papagayo Beach - 15.3 km / 9.5 mi
Marina Rubicon - 16.5 km / 10.2 mi
Playa Dorada - 16.8 km / 10.4 mi
Plaza Nuestra Senora del Carmen - 16.8 km / 10.4 mi
Cotillo Beach - 17.3 km / 10.8 mi
Casa Museo Unamuno - 23.8 km / 14.8 mi
Fuerteventura Golf Course - 36.1 km / 22.4 mi
Betancuria Church - 38.4 km / 23.9 mi
Jurado Beach - 45.7 km / 28.4 mi
Ajuy Beach - 46.5 km / 28.9 mi
La Pared Beach - 66.8 km / 41.5 mi
Costa Calma Beach - 71.8 km / 44.6 mi

The preferred airport for Hotel Riu Palace Tres Islas is Puerto del Rosario (FUE-Fuerteventura) - 29.2 km / 18.2 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.
